testsuite.test:
isDataNetworkConnected Does it return a boolean value
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isDataNetworkConnected Verify that false is returned properly
Instructions: 1) Disconnect the phone from any network (WiFi, Bluetooth, Edge, IRDA, etc.)! 2) Press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isDataNetworkConnected Verify that true is returned properly
Instructions: 1) Connect the phone to some network (WiFi, Bluetooth, Edge, IRDA, etc.)! 2) Press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

networkConnectionType Verify it returns an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

networkConnectionType Verify the values
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Are the listed connection types those that the phone is connected to?

getNetworkConnectionName Verify it is not empty string
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getNetworkConnectionName Verify that each type returns a value
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getNetworkConnectionName missing parameter
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getNetworkConnectionName invalid parameter
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onNetworkConnectionChanged Verify that the callback fires
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Connect to a different data network, e.g. from 3G to WiFi (within 2 minutes).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
